website_summaries.verdict: Lower-cost detergent option. Perfect for big families with lots of laundry on their hands.
pros: Detergent with a pleasant smell that's capable of removing tough stains and getting out stuck-on odors
High-volume format lasts a long time
Formula doesn't seem to lead to skin reactions despite the fact that it's not designed explicitly for sensitive skin
cons: Isolated complaints regarding product package leaks

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: They came unboxed with half of the deferment in them. No place on here to report or return
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite detergent!! I have used it for many years even before I had a child. Now it is the ONLY one I use. It fights stains so well. Between my hubby who works in a tire distributing factory (oil,grime and grease) and our 5 year old. There is always some sort of stain or spill. This detergent has never let me down. It smells awesome! You can pre-treat hard stains with it first as well. I haven't had anything it hasn't been able to remove. The large container lasts us months and the fact that I can get it here on Amazon and not have to lug it home is all the better. Lifetime customer here =)
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Z

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent
customer_reviews.text: Usually a Tide person but this was cheaper so I thought I’d give it a go! Smells amazing😁
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: The product was fine and no leaks when delivered
customer_reviews.text: The product was fine and no leaks when delivered. I love this detergent b/c it gets the stains and smells out of my mechanic sons work clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Erwin

customer_reviews.title: Gets Out Stains, Smells Great, Costs Less!
customer_reviews.text: Quite simply, this detergent works just as well as the bigger name brands like Tide (which I've been using for years, incidentally). Saw the low price on this and couldn't resist trying it out. Works every bit as well, even in cold water, and leaves your clothes smelling great. Why overpay for detergent? Most excellent. Will definitely be buying this again. Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: A. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I get the best results from Arm & Hammer
customer_reviews.text: Been using the same detergent for years and after using other brands, I get the best results from Arm & Hammer. Not belittling any other products, I just like the finish I get with Arm & Hammer
customer_reviews.author: Robert Casale

customer_reviews.title: great price, weak packaging
customer_reviews.text: Was glad to get this at a great price. Had it sitting on the counter in the laundry room only to come in one day and find about 1/4 of it had leaked out of a crack in the bottom of the jug. Had to transfer to empty milk jugs then mop up the rest.
customer_reviews.author: mammasawnT

customer_reviews.title: Quality Laundry Detergent
customer_reviews.text: Very nice deal for the amount that you receive and it smells really nice. I don't know what else you could desire from laundry detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the greatest laundry detergents
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it smells and how great it gets my clothes clean. I also liked the fact that it last a very long time Because it only takes a small amount to do laundry with. I was surprised that it lasted me two months unlike some of the others that did not even last a whole month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two shirts-one stained
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally bought my husband and Grandson the same gray long sleeved T-shirt but could easily tell them apart b/c my husband's had a grease stain on the front that Tide could not get out. Imagine my surprise when in my first load using A & H, the two shirts were exactly the same-the stain came out the very first time I used it. So cheap and an excellent detergent!
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Delivered damaged and leaking a lot, everywhere.
customer_reviews.text: Product has leaked out all over our front porch and is all inside the box. Delivered in the last hour while we were gone. Broken top. Still leaking all over my counter.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Sipe

customer_reviews.title: Leaks upon shipment
customer_reviews.text: We love this detergent but it’s the second time we’ve ordered and it shows up having leaked all through the shipment box. It’s a hot mess and there is no way to get your money back. It’s a huge loss
customer_reviews.author: Susan Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Gag me with the scent
customer_reviews.text: Price is good but the scent lives on forever. Won’t buy clean burst scent again.
customer_reviews.author: Jan B

customer_reviews.title: Clothes were dirty now they're clean :)
customer_reviews.text: We always use this product but usually buy it from the store. I needed to spend a certain amount for free shipping so I gave delivery a try. Really liked the grip tape on all the openings and feel like it helped with the shipping. Going ro be ordering this for delivery again instead of lugging them home ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Dariush & Valeriya

customer_reviews.title: It Suits Me Fine
customer_reviews.text: I started using this brand this year after bargain brands. The others sometimes left soap marks that required hand washing in spots. This is the first major brand I've tried in years. My clothing comes out of the wash and dry clean and without fragrance as I desire.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken and leaking
customer_reviews.text: Product qrrived with a broken cap and leaking all over.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: I usually use Gain but have been in a budget minded state lately and tried this. I checked with my local grocery store and the price here was cheaper. I was surprised how well it did. I didn't have any of those "spots" left on your clothes when you have washed them and have to redo them. I did add a softener to the wash I can't really say how the smell was. Having an HE washer, this huge container is lasting quite a long time. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: P. RobbinsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good! Gets all the grime out!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, as a household of 6 I need a detergent that can be as tough as me sometimes. Especially with those sports clothes! This stuff works! Not only does it get smells out, but it also works amazing on stains and any dirt or grime. I’m sold!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Skip over priced detergents!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a total snob when it comes to laundry detergent! I have two teenagers , both run their clothes to the next! Between sweat, wearing it for days( even though that have plenty of clothes) the scent is clean scent and not overwhelming! The clothes come out clean and have taken out some awful smells , especially from socks! I have always used tide or gain but frankly the cost is getting up there and with the amount of food my teens and their friends can eat , I found some savings somewhere!!!! Good detergent , will be buying again and again 😂
customer_reviews.author: Cindee and Mike Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was never a fan of liquid detergent. Moved into an apartment and they have some sweet new washers and dryers. I started using this from a recommendation from a friend. It has a great long lasting smell. For a laundry freak like myself, that really matters. I am truly sold on this product and the price per load makes it an easier choice.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Mercurio

customer_reviews.title: Messy and leaks all over the place. Even in the box.
customer_reviews.text: My first time getting this big of a laundry detergent container but I thought it would last me a long time. It was packaged upside down, the cap was cracked, it leaked all over my front steps, and the spout leaks causing even more of a mess on my laundry room floor. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: AWFUL AWFUL AWFUL THIS WAS LEAKING EVERYWHERE AND KNLY CAME HALF FULL!!!! WHAT A COMPLETE RIP-OFF!!! EVER SINGLE ITEM WAS COVERED IN LAUNDRY DETERGENT!!!!!! WE EXPECT A COMPLETE REFUND!
customer_reviews.author: eileen tebbens

customer_reviews.title: Product great ... Shipping awful...
customer_reviews.text: I love this detergent ... It is cheap...it leaves my clothes clean and smelling divine. I ordered it 2 times already and they should pay more attention when packaging. Both times there was a little spillage and i also ordered 4 other items. They should tape the caps as others do when they send detergent or laundry softener.
customer_reviews.author: MihaEla

customer_reviews.title: Won't make this mistake again
customer_reviews.text: I thought that this wad the fresh scent. Wad so disappointed to find that it was not & no oxiclean. I should of stayed w/Costco or Targets free shipping. At least I get what I need. Grrrrr Not a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: TinaMarie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying this. I bought this a year-and-a-half ago, and I still have not emptied the previous container. Suffice it to say this bottle should last you a very very long time. And, as for how it works with your clothing, it is very delicate it has a very delicate scent that's not overpowering. Also you hardly need dryer sheets because of the conditioning that this detergent applies to your clothing. I think it's great
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Klozoff

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, clothes come out clean, works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical buying laundry soap through Prime, but this Arm and Hammer detergent works really well. I like the large size, and the dispenser tap isn't some flimsy piece of garbage - it doesn't drip. Quality and cleanliness of clothing is on-par with other major brands from your local grocery store or warehouse club. Definitely worth a try for the ultra low price per laundry cycle. Will buy again...
customer_reviews.author: FussyPister

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and effective.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and at an affordable price. Works well for our laundry needs. I don’t feel good about their heavy-duty packaging, but my concern isn’t limited to just this brand. The pump spout I believe can be done away with completely. I never use it nor does anyone I know. Perhaps, you can offer the same quantity without the pump. Anything to easy the landfill problem is worth looking at.
customer_reviews.author: Just Peachy

customer_reviews.title: It works like it's supposed to and smells good
customer_reviews.text: Eh, what can you say? It's detergent. It works like it's supposed to and smells good. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L. Roy

customer_reviews.title: Great value and leaves clothes smelling amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Scent: Great fresh clean scent, not overpowering and leaves clothes smelling great after drying. Size: For 128+ loads, this has one of the best bang-for-your-buck detergents on Amazon. Quality: Gets the job done. I have yet to have a wash where there were detergent stains or clothes that were still dirty after washing. We wash out gym clothes and day clothes separately and it gets the job done, especially for two active people who wash a ton of laundry Overall: I love this product and size for family's who are washing often and need reliable quality and quantity. Overall 5/5 stars
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: This is not a bad review. It may wash the clothing. However, the smell is just too strong for me. And it stays. I only used it on one wash. I will not use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Natural Living

customer_reviews.title: Too Scented For Us. We Set the Jug Outside
customer_reviews.text: We only bought this to donate to a local wildlife rehab center. This particular laundry detergent was on the group's wish list. Personally----I don't understand why ANYONE would want to breathe in the highly scented "Clean Burst" stench from this stuff . . . but it's what they wanted. I say, buy unscented laundry detergent and BE HEALTHY.
customer_reviews.author: @your6Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: the product is fine. the packaging is not
customer_reviews.text: I guess this is the new fad for laundry detergent, with the push button spigot like we are drinking Gatorade at a high school football game. But unlike the other brands, Arm and Hammer leaves out an important feature...a cap with a measuring cup. So we are just supposed to guess how much to put in? My guess this is because people will tend to put in more than needed, or that they would if they had a measuring cup. So they will sell more. But t is just plain annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Tom H.

customer_reviews.title: It’s like a vacation for your nose!
customer_reviews.text: Imagine being whisked away into a magical forest where all of your senses are enveloped in the finest scents the world has to offer... now imagine you can bottle that. Turns out the developers of this detergent had the same idea as you just had, because this smells awesome! Cleans great. But smells awesome. It lets people know “I wash my clothes” it’s also great if you forget to shower but had time to do laundry. No more need for perfume... just wash your clothes!
customer_reviews.author: Weaks

customer_reviews.title: Value of money and efficient
customer_reviews.text: I started using this products was because I got the high efficiency washer. Beginning chose this product was based on price. I’m running airbnb business and budget is very important since we wash a lot everyday but beside money, cleanliness and scent are also very important. I tried the product and it surprisedly effective. I also like it is no strong scent. Not everyone likes the strong scent and especially we have different customers to use the liens, better to buy sth that is affordable, efficient and no strong scent.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetwood

customer_reviews.title: Package design faulty
customer_reviews.text: I dont have a problem with the soap. The design of the container is terrible. for some reason. It doesn't sit properly on a flat shelf. Both times I have bought this brand. It has fallen off the shelf. It then breaks of course. Laundry soap everywhere. I mean everywhere. For that reason. I will never buy this brand again
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t clean my clothes too well
customer_reviews.text: I had to use a LOT of soap just to clean the dirt off my clothes (multiple washings of the same load), even bought OxyClean because I thought maybe my stains were really bad. Went back to Tide and my laundry was clean on the first try again. Bought them for the value, went back to Tide because they clean better. On the plus side, this smells pretty good
customer_reviews.author: KLeeMagee

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special but nice cleam clothes
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get excited about detergent but this seemed the best by per load, both in the store and online. I will order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff D.

customer_reviews.title: Beware...
customer_reviews.text: horrible shipping. Damaged items. I order ALOT on amazon, so I took a gamble with this detergent because it was a good I price for the size. When I got my box, it smelled GREAT! That was because the bottle cracked and slowly leaked out over everything else inside that box.
customer_reviews.author: JokeR

customer_reviews.title: packaged poorly
customer_reviews.text: Came with a split in container and liquid all over the box. Disappounted. How can I get a free replacement?? (2nd request)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best detergent
customer_reviews.text: I've used this detergent for several years now and I love it. It's great for sensitive skin and cleans clothes leaving them with a light fresh scent. Not perfume-y but fresh. If you want a stronger scent, the softeners and scent boosters that have stronger scents will give you that. I even choose the softer fresh scents in those too because I prefer the light fresh clean smell of laundry.
customer_reviews.author: DeaR

customer_reviews.title: Long-time favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me years ago and I have used it for both hand and machine washing. My family and I tend to have allergies to many bathing and laundering products, so it is a relief to find a product that is not irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn R. Elston

customer_reviews.title: leaves clothes dingy!
customer_reviews.text: THIS DETERGENT DOESN'T WORK. WE HAVE USED OTHER ARM & HAMMER DETERGENT WITH GOOD RESULTS, BUT MAYBE THEY PUT A DIFFERENT/LESSER FORMULA FOR THE LARGE SIZE CONTAINERS? THIS DETERGENT LEFT CLOTHES, TOWELS IN NO CLEANER CONDITION THAN BEFORE THEY'RE WASHED. EVEN RUNNING THE WASH TWICE MADE NO DIFFERENCE. WE'LL USE THIS STUFF FOR CLEANING THE DRIVEWAY & PORCH - NOT CLOTHES.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie'sAngel

customer_reviews.title: quality and price
customer_reviews.text: best quality and price on the entire internet in my opinion. I am not going to ever shop around any more for better juice for the money. ONLY risk is that it could leak enrout to your house if THEY are not careful to check the lid tightness. OH WELL
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Sincavage Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent
customer_reviews.text: The detergent itself is great!! I love the smell and it gets my clothes very clean! But I noticed that in shipping it must have been damaged. There is a small hole that detergent is slowly leaking out of. If it weren’t for this slow leak I would give 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ponder

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Gets the laundry nice and clean. I thought I was getting the original fragrance that I grew up with and am quite fond of. This is a different scent but still very nice. No complaints with it being to harsh or creating problems for those with sensitive skin and does a good job removing stains and stinks in the laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this laundry product before, so I knew it was what I wanted. Fast delivery. My only complaint is that once I put it on the shelf I noticed it was leaking from somewhere in the cap or the nozzle. I had to put some rags underneath it to prevent my cabinet shelf from getting wet and moldy. I've used these convenience laundry soaps before so I know it wasn't supposed to leak. I don't know if it was damaged when leaving the warehouse, or during the delivery process. I will purchase this again, but hope that the next one won't leak!
customer_reviews.author: u don't know me

customer_reviews.title: Good laundry soap
customer_reviews.text: I bought this soap for a friend in need because of the panic buying happening at the stores because of Covid-19. She said she likes it and has had no issue with it at all. She said unlike Tide this one doesn't use harsh chemicals and I will say it smells nice. No over powering smells right out of the washer or at any point in time.
customer_reviews.author: Jes_074

customer_reviews.title: Arm & Hammer laundry detergent Fights dirt and Grime!
customer_reviews.text: Arm & Hammer laundry detergent is nothing but the truth and cleans amazingly!
customer_reviews.author: Rosetta Marie Archie

customer_reviews.title: Great price great product
customer_reviews.text: This product seem to clean all the dirty clothes we put into the washing machine. It really does not leave the strong scent. We do not have anyone in our home that has super sensitive skin, so I don’t know if anyone would be adversely affected or not. However, it does seem to clean the clothes very nicely! Great product for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: lms1968

customer_reviews.title: Better than Tide
customer_reviews.text: I quit Tide after 30 years due to PGs offensive advertising with Gillette. I found Arm & Hammer is far far better than Tide. Smells better, cleans better. A better product.
customer_reviews.author: lll

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is my usual go to laundry detergent. It cleans well, smells nice and is a good value. I purchased it thru Amazon when it was on sale, so it was an even better deal. Lasts a while, even with all the laundry a family of four creates. The design of the dispenser nozzle is such that there are no drips...it seals immediately when you stop pushing the button, which I appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Works well and gets the cloths clean
customer_reviews.text: I like the larger size and easy to use as I keep it on a shelf above the washer. Washes cloths well and leaves no scent
customer_reviews.author: Latha

customer_reviews.title: Best laundry detergent for the money
customer_reviews.text: The arm and hammer laundry detergent is the best in my opinion. The amount you get for the money charged is very reasonable. It smells so good on my clothes and lasts for a long time. Even if clothes are accidently left in the washer longer before being put in the dryer, they are still fresh smelling. I love this detergent
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Awsome cleaning power!
customer_reviews.text: Super powerful Landry detergent! I am super happy both with the smell and the cleaning power of this brand and product.
customer_reviews.author: scarlettac

customer_reviews.title: economical
customer_reviews.text: It was the least expensive laundry soap available per use at the time of purchase. I do add more for larger loads or heavily-soiled items. It doesn't get grease out as well as Tide, however, but it's acceptable. It does have an odor that I dislike, however.
customer_reviews.author: Gossamer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality & Very Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Does not clean clothes nearly as well as other brand name laundry detergents. Nothing worse than having to wash clothes a second time just to have them seem thoroughly clean. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes and yes
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried all the detergents ever made, but somehow I swear up and down by arm and hammer. The ONLY detergent that gets my babies dirty clothes (milk stains, crumbs, jelly...) off their clothes! And leaves them smelling looking and feeling super clean! Great value for this price! I will buy over and over !
customer_reviews.author: shayna

customer_reviews.title: Arm Hammer Laundry soap
customer_reviews.text: I brought this soap for my two brothers...so far they love it..they don't have no problems..their children have no problems with their skins..if they love it and it don't affect the children then I am happy also..the price is good and affordable make it easy for me to buy both of them and I can do that for them each month..
customer_reviews.author: charmaine

customer_reviews.title: Damaged item
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered today damaged. Almost all was spilled over other items in the box as you can see on picture. The bottle top was leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Katerina

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my clothes clean and fresh
customer_reviews.text: My clothes smell great and always come out clean. I can't believe the price is so cheap.(not complaining). Don't use anything else except tide but those prices are to much for me.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Arrived leaking
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great, but it was leaking from the seam of the plastic. It leaked all over the other items that I bought. It had to have been leaking from the factory, but Amazon sent it to me anyway.
customer_reviews.author: JCS

customer_reviews.title: A soap that gently cleans my daily laundry at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product because it is mild and gentle on my clothes and cleans well enough for daily laundry. I use it with 2 in1 drop ins and spray and wash when needed. Works great! Best “bang for your buck” in my opinion 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Augie

customer_reviews.title: Work's very good
customer_reviews.text: We love this product, but this time it had a hole in in so we didn't get all of it. We didn't call customer we got all but 1/2 cup. No worries.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Perri

customer_reviews.title: My go-to detergent
customer_reviews.text: I can't handle heavily perfumed detergents on my sensitive skin which is why I started using A&H in the first place. I've been using it for over 20 years now and it will always be a staple in my house. Cleans clothes as well as the expensive brands without the heavy smell.
customer_reviews.author: Thoracias

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast. Works great on stains and odors. Lasts long!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Good product but arrived with a leak and soap in the box
customer_reviews.text: We love this product but unfortunately, the box arrived with it spilled inside. After cleaning up, we were good to go. Thankfully, it did not get on other items.
customer_reviews.author: Tulsan

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS TOO STRONG
customer_reviews.text: THis was really reasonably priced...I’m going to stop buying for the price. I have to give this away or return it because the scent is SO STRONG...and my clothes smell like it after...and I don’t like how my clothes FEEL after they are washed.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Clean and smells great
customer_reviews.text: I think this detergent is great I love the way it smells I especially love that if I made a softener on stoppable’s that when I take my laundry out of the laundry detergent makes it smells so clean and fresh it’s unbelievable how good it smells I just love it and it does a great job on getting stains out
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Best Laundry detergent for the Cost
customer_reviews.text: My all time favorite laundry detergent. It is the best smell and works the best. The Psi Clean does a great job removing stains at half the cost of other detergents! Has a better scent than the big brand names! A&H makes the all around best products!
customer_reviews.author: IamKrusty

customer_reviews.title: Best for less!
customer_reviews.text: I'm sold on Arm & Hammer laundry detergent because it works, smells great, and is lsss-costl k than similar brands. It's my go-to detergent for all washables.
customer_reviews.author: G. L. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived there was laundry detergent all over the inside of the box and the jug. I am disappointed 😞
customer_reviews.author: kaitlyn L.

customer_reviews.title: strong scent!@!!
customer_reviews.text: the smell is so strong that you can smell it in the street when drying in a dryer that vents outside. Awful. I had to donate it. Unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Only to be used in washing machine and not for hand washing clothing
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients in this product are toxic to humans and animals. I had a bad reaction to this product. But the company was nice enough to refund my $10. I do not recommend this product due to the dyes, the toxic chemicals in the product and what it can do to you and the environment.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Nice price
customer_reviews.text: If you have sensitive skin then this is not for you. We enjoy the fragrance and cost of it. When having a family stay the night we soon realized that it's not for someone who has eczema or sensitive skin. If you don't have those issues than this is a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R G

customer_reviews.title: Not the best. Not the worst.
customer_reviews.text: A very cheap price for its size as Prime Pantry item. Too good to pass up. It does take more detergent to produce substance (bubbles) than another brand I usually use. I’m torn on another buy despite the clearance price. I went through it faster than other detergents.
customer_reviews.author: meshelle

customer_reviews.title: I’d tap that...put in cart button if I were you
customer_reviews.text: My skin does its own thing sometimes and I’m just left looking like...wtf. This detergent has always worked for me so when I bought this last year and saw how low the price was, I practically jumped out of my skin! I’m not sure how much it costs now but I’ll check and if it’s a decent price, I’ll purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Heff

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this detergent because I wanted to save some money. It is good for the price ,but it is nothing like the tide or gain detergent. I didn't like the smell and it felt very cheap. If you want to save some money, it does its job for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashish

customer_reviews.title: Comes in handy !!
customer_reviews.text: I really love buying the big tubs! These come in handy!! I wash a lot .. we have two adults who work out and go to work plus two little ones under five so we go through a lot of clothes each week. These tubs last us a good two three months.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A

customer_reviews.title: Poor packing job
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints about the product. I absolutely love arm & hammer.. always have. Unfortunately, it was sealed/packed properly and my "40% extra" ended up in the bottom of the box and saturated a box of toilet tabs that were shipped in the same box. The box that the tabs were in was destroyed and the tabs were all over the place. So this wasn't a catastrophe by any means, but it was quite messy and aggravating.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful price! And really saves me a trip to Costco plus all that lifting and back/neck pain! Will definitely order again if the price stays the same! Oh! It does a wonderful job on laundry too. I’ve always been a fan of arm and hammer products.
customer_reviews.author: Y.S.

customer_reviews.title: My new laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been a Gain household for that past 10 years but in a search on amazon for a more affordable detergent I found this gem. A huge jug for super cheap. It gets our clothes clean & smells great. Ordering this from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: At least it got here
customer_reviews.text: Received my pantry box, looked the Unabomber put his most powerful device in it and detonated it. Box was destroyed, soup cans were dented, boxes of bread mix were destroyed. Amazon usually is good, but many people are saying the same thing about pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Norm Rohrer

customer_reviews.title: Liquid detergent
customer_reviews.text: Recommend,on time delivery & decent price.this was my first time using this product & I like it,will order again. I’m picky on my products but I took a chance on this one & was happy with my order.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca bolton

customer_reviews.title: leaked all over box
customer_reviews.text: wish I could have used this for laundry. upon opening the box the soap was everywhere but in its container
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: handy and easy to use - and cost efficient
customer_reviews.text: I always use this brand laundry detergent, and saw this large size- was a little worried about being able to manage it since it is heavy, but it has a very easy-to-use pouring spot and cup. works Great!! very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy D. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell
customer_reviews.text: Very strong smell for my allergy and asthma, also did not get the stains well
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: I have really bad ecszma
customer_reviews.text: and this is the only washing soap I can use that doesn't kill my skin. Arm & hammer does a great job of cleaning and not leaving behind heavy residues. I always use the "extra rinse" cycle in my washer tho to.
customer_reviews.author: WannaDoo83

customer_reviews.title: Beats the other brands at this price point.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this gets the job done. It is not like the other cheaper brands. This is more concentrated. My room mate works in the ship yards and his clothes he used to wash them twice with the other brands. Now he doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma

customer_reviews.title: Not good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This detergent smells great and will work for my husband's clothes, but I have experienced a terrible allergic reaction to it on my skin - it has brought my eczema back and I am now dealing with a really uncomfortable rash on my face. Moral of the story is to stay away from this if you have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Laundry Detergent
customer_reviews.text: This laundry detergent cleans very well and smells so good! It does not wash out the colors of my clothes, whether they are dark or light.
customer_reviews.author: Ariella

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: It makes my clothes not smell bad. Less time I HR explaining why clothes smell bad. Really good stuff. Works great, especially with pug aroma after they been on your favorite napping blanket all day.
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a problem with this detergent I wouldn't say it's for super sensitive skin I would get free and clear I generally don't like scents in my detergents.... But this one is fresh enough.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Arm & Hammer laundry detergent cleans clothes very well and leaves a wonderful scent to the laundry.
customer_reviews.text: Arm & Hammer laundry detergent cleans clothes very well and leaves clothes with a long lasting pleasant fragrance. I switched from another brand to Arm & Hammer. I have ordered the Arm & Hammer twice and will use this brand in the future. So glad I ordered Arm & Hammer laundry detergent from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Edna G

customer_reviews.title: Damaged in transport
customer_reviews.text: The laundry soap is fine, but the measuring cup was broken in transport. I have a measuring cup, but it doesn't fit on the bottle so I have to keep it separate and use my own products. The product is fine, but this isn't the first time that my product has been damaged in transport and (while the product is okay) I can't use it as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a lot of stains to deal with, so this detergent gets the job done! I have sensitive skin, but I've never had an issue with this product. I love that I get so much for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Gross

customer_reviews.title: It Does what is is Supposed to Do and at a Cheap Price!
customer_reviews.text: I think my title says it all. I am certainly not knowledgeable in this department, but I can put clothes in a washer fill the detergent cup and push the on button and they come out clean.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonheart

customer_reviews.title: Arm and Hammer
customer_reviews.text: Price point had me try this brand. Compared to Tide/Gain, it’s a much better deal with the same quality. It’s not affected our sensitive skin. The scent is fresh, not a strong scent. Love that it’s delivered. Only one minor issue of the squeeze spout falling apart. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tena

customer_reviews.title: arm & hammer liquid detergent
customer_reviews.text: used in laundry. good with whites, cut dirt easy leaving items white and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: shannie

customer_reviews.title: Great for towels and cleaning rags
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be less harsh than Tide. I like the fresh scent, that is not overwhelming. I absolutely love the price. I appreciate the fact that it does not have fabric softener in it.
customer_reviews.author: JHrdina

customer_reviews.title: Sorry
customer_reviews.text: Well, hubby is a mechanic... so I have used this for years and now something happened to the formula. We changed brands and seems like the costco one is much better all around.
customer_reviews.author: Whiskers2007

product_meta.title: Arm & Hammer Laundry Detergent Liquid He, Clean Burst, 210 Ounce
product_meta.description:
The only detergent with the cleaning and freshening power of arm & hammer baking soda, our laundry detergent delivers the clean you need. It leaves clothes powerfully clean and naturally fresh, and is designed to power out dirt and odors. Special, lower-sudsing formula rinses cleaner and is designed to work in both standard machines and today's energy conscious high efficiency (he) models. Special agents in the detergent trap the soil in the wash water, so it rinses away and doesn't redeposit on your clothes. Keeps your laundry smelling clean burst fresh and clean.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Product Dimensions :5.97 x 10.7 x 10.1 inches; 13.13 Pounds
 * Date First Available :August 8, 2017
 * Manufacturer :Church & Dwight
 * ASIN :B074NB6DHY

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:4.8 out of 5 stars11,225 ratings The only detergent with the cleaning and freshening power of arm & hammer baking soda, our laundry detergent delivers the clean you need. It leaves clothes powerfully clean and naturally fresh, and is designed to power out dirt and odors. Special, lower-sudsing formula rinses cleaner and is designed to work in both standard machines and today's energy conscious high efficiency (he) models. Special agents in the detergent trap the soil in the wash water, so it rinses away and doesn't redeposit on your clothes. Keeps your laundry smelling clean burst fresh and clean.
feature_bullets: Leaves clothes powerfully clean and naturally fresh
Works in both standard and he machines
